mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, login_name, login_password, user_sex, locked, ( SELECT group_concat(role_sign SEPARATOR ',') FROM SYS_ROLE WHERE role_id in ( SELECT role_id FROM SYS_USER_ROLE WHERE user_id = su.user_id ) ) roleSign FROM SYS_USER su WHERE login_name = #{loginName} AND login_password = #{loginPassword}
